basics.name: Teodor Neagoe
basics.label: Software Engineer | Student | Founder
basics.summary: Software Engineer with experience in production app development (Uber internship; Recollect CTO; YellowDocs Technical Co-Founder), robotics (RoboCup participant), and AI-driven systems (honours research at TU Delft; Ekkie.ai founding-engineer)

education.area: Computer Science & Engineering with Quantum Science & Quantum Information Minor
courses: OOP Project: Full-stack expense splitter (Spring Boot, JavaFX
Interpreter with desugarer & type checker in Scala; Ray tracer in C++ with OpenGL
Quantum Engineering Project: Implemented qkNN in Python (Qiskit)

work.name: Ekkie.ai
highlights: Rebuilt the dispatcher (1 of 3 products sold to customers) from 0 in Python within the first 2 weeks
Designing & building the new deterministic engine using Spring Boot Kotlin (previously implemented in Python)
Tech stack: Kotlin (Spring Boot), Python (Microsoft Agent Framework) TypeScript (Next.js), Autotask, Topdesk, Azure suite (Graph, SQL, Blob)

work.name: YellowDocs.com
highlights: Secured 2 paying customers within the first 2 months (both interested in investing)

work.name: Uber
highlights: Designed & implemented an internal tool to simplify data retrieval for our team; built endpoints & frontend
Re-designed & implemented ui routing (for our team products's) to support scalable deployment across multiple UI versions
Onboarded the team to a new observability tool, improving monitoring & debugging capabilities for our product with funneling
Tech stack: Go (Fx), TypeScript (React + Fusion.js), Protobuf, Phabricator, nginx

work.name: WTSS
highlights: As part of team of 5 students, we created a proof of concept arhitecture from the ground up for their whole software
Built a code generation platform for e2e tests for  Playwright, Appium, and API testing
Tech stack: Java (Spring Boot), TypeScript (React), Playwright, Appium, Docker

work.name: Delft Mercurians - Tu Delft's RoboCup Team
highlights: Built a Rust-based physics simulator using Bevy & Rapier

projects.name: GDB Driver for Java - Java library for easier GDB debugging
Jarvis - Flutter Firebase Personal assistant (Alexa + Todoist + Notion)

-publications.name: How Expert Consultation Affects Creativity: The Role of Expert Input in Early Stage Innovation
